commands.command: CREATE TABLE TempOrdersHeaderTbl ( [TOHeaderID] AUTOINCREMENT, [CustomerID] INT , [OrderDate] DateTime, [RoastDate] DateTime, [RequiredByDate] DateTime , [ToBeDeliveredByID] INT , [Confirmed] YESNO, [Done] YESNO, [Notes] MEMO, CONSTRAINT [pk_TOHeaderID] PRIMARY KEY (TOHeaderID) )

CREATE TABLE TempOrdersLinesTbl ( [TOLineID] AUTOINCREMENT, [TOHeaderID] INT , [ItemID] INT , [ServiceTypeID] INT, [Qty] SINGLE , [PackagingID] INT, [OriginalOrderID] INT, CONSTRAINT [pk_TOLineID] PRIMARY KEY (TOLineID) )
ALTER ABLE CustomersTbl ADD SendDeliveryConfirmation YESNO
SELECT TOP 10 CompanyName, SendDeliveryConfirmation FROM CustomersTbl
ALTER TABLE ItemTypeTbl ADD UnitsPerQty SINGLE
ALTER TABLE ItemTypeTbl ALTER COLUMN UnitsPerQty SINGLE
UPDATE ItemTypeTbl SET UnitsPerQty = 1
UPDATE ItemTypeTbl SET UnitsPerQty = 25 WHERE SKU="8JuraCln25"
UPDATE ItemTypeTbl SET UnitsPerQty = 3 WHERE SKU="8JuraDecaTab"
UPDATE ItemTypeTbl SET UnitsPerQty = 6 WHERE SKU="8JuraCln6"
SELECT ItemTypeID, SKU, ItemDesc, ItemEnabled, ItemsCharacteritics, UnitsPerQty, ServiceTypeId FROM ItemTypeTbl WHERE (SKU LIKE '8%')
